page.title: 08MUSIC IN TICKHILL
page.content: Tickhill has had a{Music Society}since 1977.The first performance was organised by an individual but since then a committee has been formed.In 1985 the membership fee is Â£5.50 for the season.The society tries to get famous people to perform for them. The music is mainly classical although they have also had Jazz and Indian music.As well as music{lessons}in the schools,there are also a lot of private tutors in Tickhill,mainly for piano but also for cello and guitar. We conducted a survey to see{pop groups/solo artists people at our school prefered.The following results were obtained,Wham46%,Duran Duran16% ,Madonna 16%,Paul Young12%,Nik Kershaw 8%,Bronski Beat 2%.Another survey showed that 20% listen to the radio, 17% buy records,57% buy tapes while 6% do none of these.
